name: search
description:
Lists species that have names or descriptions matching the search terms.

Various modifiers are supported for filtering results: `group`, `zone`, `role`, `name`, `owner`, `status`, and `taxon`, as well as `genus`, `family`, and so on.

The `group` modifier sorts the results into groupings. For example, to group by zone, use `group:zone`. Supported groupings are `zone`, `genus`, `owner`, `status`, and `role`.
